import OptimizedImage from "../OptimizedImage"; import useButtonAction from "../../hooks/useButtonAction"; function Salery() { const { handleStartHiring } = useButtonAction(); return (
{/* Header Section */}
Pricing

Save up to 70% on salaries

{/* Content Section */}
{/* Main Pricing Card */}
{/* Pricing Image */}
{/* Pricing Content */}
{/* Price Header */}
Price
20% of First-Year Salary
{/* Features List */}
One-Time Placement Fee
No hidden fees or ongoing charges.
Risk-Free
If you don't make a hire, you don't pay anything.
Full Transparency
You receive a detailed breakdown of costs upfront, so you know exactly what you're paying for with no surprises.
{/* CTA Button */}
{/* Testimonial Card */}
); } export default Salery;
